titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on 2-Acetylnicotinic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
12/5/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on 2-Acetylnicotinic acid.
